sentences.en: a collection of dishes to tempt your palate
sentences.cn: 让人胃口大开的一系列菜肴

sentences.en: Cleft palate is exterior the charge of repair operation how.
sentences.cn: 腭裂外部修复手术的费用如何.

sentences.en: Correction of palate clefts is much more difficult and usually not as satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 硬腭裂的矫正更为困难,且常不理想.

sentences.en: I discovered that I have a really sharp palate.
sentences.cn: 有天我发现自己真的有敏锐的味觉.

sentences.en: It tasted very strange, at least to my untrained palate.
sentences.cn: 这东西尝起来怪怪的，至少对于我这未经训练的味觉来说是如此。

sentences.en: Objective To explore the experience of caring infants with cleft palate repair.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨唇腭裂修补术患儿的护理经验.

sentences.en: Results Cleft lip ( CL ): 931 cases ( 19.57 % ), Cleft lip with palate ( CL + P ): 2743 cases ( 57.65 % ), Cleft palate only ( CPO ) : 1084 cases ( 22.78 % ).
sentences.cn: 结果单纯唇裂 ( cleftlipCL ) 931例 ( 19.57% ), 唇裂伴腭裂(cleftlip with palate CL+P ) 2743 例 ( 57.65% ), 单纯腭裂 ( cleftpalateonlyCPO ) 1084例 ( 22.78% ).

sentences.en: She has a palate for wine.
The back of the tongue makes contact with the back part of the palate.
sentences.cn: 舌背和上腭的后部接触.

sentences.en: The new flavour pleased his palate.
sentences.cn: 这种新的调味品满足了他的口味.

sentences.en: The palate is full - flavored , with soft and juicy tannins.
sentences.cn: 口感饱满, 柔滑而果味浓郁的单宁.

sentences.en: The soft palate is very red and displaced forward.
The soft palate is very red.
The word palate also means taste or liking.
sentences.cn: Palate这个词也有“口味”或“嗜好”的意思.

sentences.en: These nuts have been market tested and found to be most suited to the Australian palate.
sentences.cn: 这些坚果已经做过市场测试，结果发现它们最合澳大利亚人的口味。

sentences.en: Too much sweet food cloys the palate.
sentences.cn: 吃过多的甜食会使人倒胃口.

trans.tran_cn: 味觉，嗜好，审美眼光，鉴赏力，<解>腭，[植]下唇瓣
trans.tran_en: the  roof (= top inside part )  of your mouth
